sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：余讀孟子書，至梁惠王問「何以利吾國」，未嘗不廢書而嘆也。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian said: I read Mengzi book, to Liang Hui Wang ask 'what to benefit my state', never not put down book sigh.
Said: Alas, profit truly chaos beginning!

sentences.chinese: 夫子罕言利者，常防其原也。
sentences.literal: Master rarely speak profit, constantly guard its source.
Therefore said 'put at profit practice, many resent'.

sentences.chinese: 自天子至於庶人，好利之獘何以異哉！
sentences.literal: From Son of Heaven to common people, good profit calamity how different!

sentences.chinese: 道既通，游事齊宣王，宣王不能用。
sentences.literal: Way already pass, travel serve Qi Xuan Wang, Xuan Wang not able use.

sentences.chinese: 適梁，梁惠王不果所言，則見以為迂遠而闊於事情。
sentences.literal: Go Liang, Liang Hui Wang not adopt his words, then see as circuitous far overlook affairs.
Chu Wei use Wu Qi, battle win weaken enemy;

sentences.chinese: 齊威王、宣王用孫子、田忌之徒，而諸侯東面朝齊。
sentences.literal: Qi Wei Wang Xuan Wang use Sun Zi Tian Ji kind, feudal lords east face court Qi.

sentences.chinese: 天下方務於合從連衡，以攻伐為賢，而孟軻乃述唐、虞、三代之德，是以所如者不合。
sentences.literal: World just strive unite vertical connect horizontal, consider attack invade worthy, Meng Ke then state Tang Yu three dynasties virtue, therefore where go not match.

sentences.chinese: 退而與萬章之徒序詩書，述仲尼之意，作孟子七篇。
sentences.literal: Retire with Wan Zhang kind sequence Shi Shu, state Zhong Ni intention, make Meng Zi seven scrolls.
